attributes.action: Give key workers that worked though the Covid-19 Pandemic 5 paid hoildays extra
attributes.additional_details: As the key workers put there lifes at risk every day going to work to keep Britain moving and food on the tables,  also the government to scrap the idea of giving a extra bank holiday to all
attributes.background: For all workers (NHS,police, emergency services and all key workers that's worked every day to keep the country running and keep food on the tables to be given 5 days extra hoilday paid by the government as a way of saying thankyou to them

rejection.details:
This is a matter for employers, not the UK Parliament or Government. 

You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308172
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
